class Deck[source]

Deck()

Represents a deck of cards. Attributes: cards: list of Card objects.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

A Deck of cards is a collection of cards!

{% raw %} 
d = Deck()
assert isinstance(d.pop_card(), Card)
